question: 設ける
sourceMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an <ja>う</ja> sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>establish</kanji> so the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to establish</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: What are you going <vocabulary>to establish</vocabulary>? How about a system for <reading>mow</reading>ing (<ja>もう</ja>) lawns? It's very important that lawns are mowed according to an established system, you know. How do you mow yours?
